meanings.definition: An expert or connoisseur in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The mayvin of desserts knew everything about cakes and pastries.
meanings.sent2: She was considered a mayvin in the world of fashion design.
meanings.sent3: The mayvin of gardening could make any plant thrive with just a touch.
meanings.sent4: He was a mayvin in the art of negotiation, always finding the best deals.
meanings.sent5: The mayvin of astronomy could identify any constellation in the night sky.
